charges.charge_description: 18:658 LENDING, CREDIT INSTITUTIONS-Defendant, with the intent to defraud the Secretary of Agriculture acting through the Farmer's Home Administration, did knowingly and willfully dispose of and convert to his own use and the use of another, catfish with a value in excess of $100.00, said catfish having been mortgaged and pledged by defendant to the Secretary of Agriculture acting through the Farmer's Home Administration (1)

charges.charge_disposition: Defendant is committed to custody of BOP for 6 months and shall make restitution in amount of $31,086.03 at the direction of USPO to Farmers Home Administration; defendant is also ordered to pay to the Clerk the sum of $75 per month beginning 7-1-93 as ordered by Judge Wilson on 6-13-93 to go toward payment of his court appointed counsel; amount owed as of date of sentencing is $300; upon release shall be on supervised release for 3 years with standard conditions and special condition of any restitution to the victim that remains unpaid at the time of release from confinement shall be a condition of supervised release and shall be payable in minimum monthly installments of $50 as directed by USPO; any balance that remains unpaid to Clerk for court appointed counsel shall also be made a condition of supervised release and shall be paid as directed by USPO; special assessment of $50 to CVF due within 7 days; no fine imposed; shall surrendr by 2:00 PM 1-3-94. (1)
